page.title: 07Fashion and Clothes
page.content: Fashion is very important to young people. Shoes that are fashionable are stiletos but if people cannot afford them they have to buy others.Clothes in the fashion are stretch-jeans,tight skirts,fashionale jumpers,T-shirts. Lots of girls wear tights,ankle-socks or netting on their legs. Boys wear tight jeans,tight trousers and T-shirts with picture/writing on them. Fashionable shoes for boys have a little bit of heal and either laces at the edge or slip-ons with a fancy bit at the front. There are fashionable dresses for girls,eg.mini-dresses and tight dresses and there is fashionable jewelry,eg.necklaces,earrings,braclets. Hairstyles range from skin-heads to perms. Some dye their hair bright colours eg. green,purple.Some have spike,coloured or mohican hairstyles.
